Distributions

Construction

DiscretisedFluidQueues.SFMDistribution — Type
SFMDistribution{T <: Mesh}

Representation of the distribution of a DiscretisedFluidQueue.

The field coeffs is a row-vector and indexing a distribution indexes this field. Similarly, arithmetic operations on a distribution act on this vector.

Arguments:

  • coeffs::Array{Float64, 2}: A row vector of coefficients which encode the distribution of a DiscretisedFluidQueue and can be used to reconstruct a solution.
  • dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue{T}:
source
DiscretisedFluidQueues.interior_point_mass — Function
interior_point_mass(x::Float64, i::Int, dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue{<:Mesh})

Construct an approximation to a distribution of fluid queue with a point mass at (x,i). Returns a SFMDistribution. The method of approximation is defined by the type of <:Mesh.

Arguments:

  • x::Float64: The position of the point mass
  • i::Int: The phase of the point mass
  • dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue:
source
interior_point_mass(x::Float64, i::Int, dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue{DGMesh{T}})

Constructs a polynomial approximation to the point mass at (x,i)

source
interior_point_mass(x::Float64, i::Int, dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue{FVMesh})

Construct an approximation to a point mass at (x,i). Basically, just puts mass 1 in the cell containing (x,i).

source
interior_point_mass(x::Float64, i::Int, dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue{FRAPMesh})

Return the appropriate initial condition to approximate the initial distribution which is a point mass at (x,i) for the numerical discretisation scheme defined by the dq DiscretisedFluidQueue.

See here for more

source
DiscretisedFluidQueues.left_point_mass — Function
left_point_mass(i::Int, dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue)

Construct a SFMDistribution with a point mass at the left boundary of dq in phase i and 0 elsewhere.

source
DiscretisedFluidQueues.right_point_mass — Function
right_point_mass(i::Int, dq::DiscretisedFluidQueue)

Construct a SFMDistribution with a point mass at the left boundary of dq in phase i and 0 elsewhere.

source

Reconstructing solutions

DiscretisedFluidQueues.pdf — Method
pdf(d::SFMDistribution)

Return a function of two variables (x::Float64,i::Int) which is the probability distribution function defined by d. Approximates the density function of a fluid queue.

source
DiscretisedFluidQueues.pdf — Method
pdf(d::SFMDistribution, x, i)

Evaluate pdf(d::SFMDistribution) at (x,i).

source
DiscretisedFluidQueues.cdf — Method
cdf(d::SFMDistribution)

Return a function of two variables (x::Real,i::Int) which is the cumulative distribution distribution function defined by d. Approximates the distribution function of a fluid queue.

source
DiscretisedFluidQueues.cdf — Method
cdf(d::SFMDistribution, x, i)

Evaluate cdf(d::SFMDistribution) at (x,i).

source
